actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Water Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Water Resources Development Act of 1986 relating to cost sharing.

summary.text: Amends the Water Resources Development Act of 1986 to provide that the cost sharing provisions do not apply to: (1) the construction of harbors with a depth of 20 feet or less; (2) certain flood control projects in Arkansas within the boundaries of the watersheds of the Mississippi River and tributaries; and (3) the feasibility studies, planning, engineering, and design of such flood control projects.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Water Resources Development Act of 1986 relating to cost sharing.
